thought: Slack message sending fails due to missing parameters. I need to provide complete parameters including channel selection, channelId, messageType, and text. The text should be dynamically taken from input data, so I will set text to empty string in params and rely on input data for actual message text.
plan: Set Slack action params with select as 'channel'
Set channelId mode to 'name' and value to 'general'
Set text to empty string to be overridden by input data
criticism: Previous Slack action params were empty, causing failure. Proper parameters are mandatory for Slack API calls.

tool_input.comments: Send classification results to Slack #general channel with correct parameters.

tool_output.error: input parameter is null, "text" for action_2. You should put something in it.
